name: Next to me
author: Imagine Dragons
text:
[D, G, Bm, A, D] 
[D]Something about the way that you 
walked into my living room 
[G]Casually and confident lookin' at the mess I am
But [Bm]still you, [A]still you want me 
[D] Stress lines and cigarettes, politics and deficits 
[G]Late bills and overages, screamin' and hollerin'
But [Bm]still you, [A]still you want me 

[D]Oh, I always let you [G]down
You're shattered on the [Bm]ground
But still I find you [A]there 
Next [D]to me
And [D]oh, stupid things I [G]do
I'm far from good, it's [Bm]true
But still I find [A]you
Next [D]to me
 
[D]There's something about the way that you always see the pretty view
[G]Overlook the blooded mess, always lookin' effortless
And [Bm]still you, [A]still you want [D]me
[D]I got no innocence, faith ain't no privilege
[G]I am a deck of cards, vice or a game of hearts
And [Bm]still you, [A]still you want [D]me

[D]Oh, I always let you [G]down
You're shattered on the [Bm]ground
But still I find you [A]there 
Next [D]to me
And [D]oh, stupid things I [G]do
I'm far from good, it's [Bm]true
But still I find [A]you
Next [D]to me
                    
[D]So thank you for [G]taking a chance on me
I know it isn't [Bm]easy [A]                       
But I hope to be worth [D]it
[D]So thank you for [G]taking a chance on me
I know it isn't [Bm]easy [A]                       
But I hope to be worth [D]it
 
[D]Oh, I always let you [G]down
You're shattered on the [Bm]ground
But still I find you [A]there 
Next [D]to me
And [D]oh, stupid things I [G]do
I'm far from good, it's [Bm]true
But still I find [A]you
Next [D]to me
